name: BloggingUniversity
0:
”Alexa, open blogging university”
”Alexa, start blogging university”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blogging university
des: Welcome to Blogging University! In this game, Alexa will read aloud to you and ask you questions about each listening segment. Test your listening comprehension and how you remember blogging facts by remembering facts and details. Answer correctly, get your high score, and get ready to graduate from Blogging University! Notes: Some information in this Skill may be inaccurate. If you find that info in this Skill is inaccurate, please write a review about it and we'll fix it. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
